item.title: Self-Study in September 2019
item.description: Profiling Memory Allocations In iOS With Instruments Describes a technique for profiling memory allocations Tags: memory-management, memory-allocation, tool, technique, ios, matt-eaton Id: 237dd71a-dc50-11e9-b201-0242ac110003 Read: Sat, 21 Sep 2019 09:13:56 +0000 Programming as translation Converting the real world into digital abstractions requires distillation. And, like literary translators, developers must understand their biases. Tags: alvaro-videla, old_sound, analogy, metaphor, quote, umberto-eco Id: a2c0f458-dc50-11e9-95d7-0242ac110003 Read: Sat, 21 Sep 2019 09:17:29 +0000
